evidence_in_dialogue: ( She hears a sound behind her , turns and finds another inmate , Kenny Valdez , crouching on the floor near the wall , his hands and mouth bloody . )
[[Adam_Trent]] i took his head and i smashed it into the floor
[[Sara]] your lipstick is on his underwear
[[Sara]] you have seven out of 13 alleles in common with your patient , adam trent
